languages.text: "Право... то было пустое. Вы уже дали понять, что на сем корабле мои руки и уста связаны вашей волей. А потому я более не желаю тратить время на праздные беседы".

traits.locale_text: "Право... то было пустое. Вы уже дали понять, что на сем корабле мои руки и уста связаны вашей волей. А потому я более не желаю тратить время на праздные беседы".

languages.text: "Nothing of consequence... I see now. For you have already made it quite clear that, on board this vessel, my hands and lips are bound by your will. Therefore, I do not wish to fritter away time on pointless conversation."
languages.original_text: "Право... то было пустое. Вы уже дали понять, что на сем корабле мои руки и уста связаны вашей волей. А потому я более не желаю тратить время на праздные беседы".

traits.locale_text: "Nothing of consequence... I see now. For you have already made it quite clear that, on board this vessel, my hands and lips are bound by your will. Therefore, I do not wish to fritter away time on pointless conversation."

"Nothing of consequence... I see now. For you have already made it quite clear that, on board this vessel, my hands and lips are bound by your will. Therefore, I do not wish to fritter away time on pointless conversation."

"Nothing of consequence... I see now. For you have already made it quite clear that, on board this vessel, my hands and lips are bound by your will. Therefore, I do not wish to fritter away time on pointless conversation."

"Nothing of consequence... I see now. For you have already made it quite clear that, on board this vessel, my hands and lips are bound by your will. Therefore, I do not wish to fritter away time on pointless conversation."

languages.text: “没什么重要的事情……我现在明白了。你已经说得很清楚，在这艘船上，我的双手与我的喉舌都被你的意志所束缚。因此，我不打算把时间浪费在毫无意义的谈话上。”
languages.original_text: "Nothing of consequence... I see now. For you have already made it quite clear that, on board this vessel, my hands and lips are bound by your will. Therefore, I do not wish to fritter away time on pointless conversation."

traits.locale_text: “没什么重要的事情……我现在明白了。你已经说得很清楚，在这艘船上，我的双手与我的喉舌都被你的意志所束缚。因此，我不打算把时间浪费在毫无意义的谈话上。”

languages.text: 「特に大事なことはありません…今、わかりました。この船上では、あたくしの手と唇は陛下の意志で拘束されていることを、はっきりと教えてくださいました。ですから、無意味な会話で時間を浪費したくはありません」
languages.original_text: "Nothing of consequence... I see now. For you have already made it quite clear that, on board this vessel, my hands and lips are bound by your will. Therefore, I do not wish to fritter away time on pointless conversation."

traits.locale_text: 「特に大事なことはありません…今、わかりました。この船上では、私の手と唇はあなたの意志で拘束されていることを、はっきりと教えてくださいました。ですから、無意味な会話で時間を浪費したくはありません」
「特に大事なことはありません…今、わかりました。この船上では、あたくしの手と唇は陛下の意志で拘束されていることを、はっきりと教えてくださいました。ですから、無意味な会話で時間を浪費したくはありません」

languages.text: "Nichts von Bedeutung ... wie mir jetzt klar ist. Denn Ihr habt unmissverständlich dargelegt, dass meine Hände und Lippen an Bord dieses Schiffes Eurem Willen unterstehen. Ich will daher keine Zeit mit sinnloser Konversation vergeuden."
languages.original_text: "Nothing of consequence... I see now. For you have already made it quite clear that, on board this vessel, my hands and lips are bound by your will. Therefore, I do not wish to fritter away time on pointless conversation."

traits.locale_text: "Nichts von Bedeutung ... wie mir jetzt klar ist. Denn Ihr habt unmissverständlich dargelegt, dass meine Hände und Lippen an Bord dieses Schiffes Eurem Willen unterstehen. Ich will daher keine Zeit mit sinnloser Konversation vergeuden."

languages.text: « Rien de très important... Comme je le réalise à présent. Vous m'avez bien fait comprendre qu'à bord de ce navire, mes mains et mes lèvres sont soumises à votre autorité. Il est donc inutile de perdre mon temps en vaines paroles. »
languages.original_text: "Nothing of consequence... I see now. For you have already made it quite clear that, on board this vessel, my hands and lips are bound by your will. Therefore, I do not wish to fritter away time on pointless conversation."

traits.locale_text: « Rien de très important... Comme je le réalise à présent. Vous m'avez bien fait comprendre qu'à bord de ce navire, mes mains et mes lèvres sont soumises à votre autorité. Il est donc inutile de perdre mon temps en vaines paroles. »

languages.text: «De nada importante... Ya veo. Ha dejado claro que a bordo de esta nave mis manos y labios están sujetos a su voluntad. Por lo tanto, no perderé el tiempo en conversaciones sin sentido».
languages.original_text: "Nothing of consequence... I see now. For you have already made it quite clear that, on board this vessel, my hands and lips are bound by your will. Therefore, I do not wish to fritter away time on pointless conversation."

traits.locale_text: «De nada importante... Ya veo. Ha dejado claro que a bordo de esta nave mis manos y labios están sujetos a su voluntad. Por lo tanto, no perderé el tiempo en conversaciones sin sentido».

languages.text: "Mühim bir konu değildi... Artık anlıyorum. Zira bu gemide ellerimin ve dudaklarımın iradene bağlı olduğunu açık ve net olarak ifade ettin. Dolayısıyla zamanımızı gayesiz konuşmalarla harcamak istemiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Nothing of consequence... I see now. For you have already made it quite clear that, on board this vessel, my hands and lips are bound by your will. Therefore, I do not wish to fritter away time on pointless conversation."

traits.locale_text: "Mühim bir konu değildi... Artık anlıyorum. Zira bu gemide ellerimin ve dudaklarımın iradene bağlı olduğunu açık ve net olarak ifade ettin. Dolayısıyla zamanımızı gayesiz konuşmalarla harcamak istemiyorum."
